title: Brill’s Later Medieval Europe series deals with all aspects of European history and culture from ca. 1100 to ca

All areas of Europe will be included; however, there will be a focus on the territories of modernday France, Germany and Great Britain, as well as on the Low Countries. Economic, social, political history and the history of culture and mentality will also be given special emphasis
